What is this all about

This is a free Jekyll mansonry theme. It was originally on Bitbucket in a private repo but you can now fork it on Github.

The color combination used here comes from CLRS.

Eh, Saigon?

Yep, a city in southern Viet Nam. Did you know Saigon has some of the world's most beautiful cafes?

  • Nomadic Notes
  • Nomad Capitalist
  • Adventure Faktory

A good advice though is probably bringing your headphones with you since Asian music taste evolves around ”Criminal” by Britney Spears and the like.
